title: dec-fundMe
description: A new decentralized way for requesting funding from friends and the public. dec-fundMe is a decentralized application that allows you to request donations from friends, it is currently deployed on a test network(Kovan)

title: Bellefu
description: Bellefu.com is a dynamic online marketplace dedicated to agriculture-related activities ensuring farmers, buyers, and sellers of agricultural products have direct contact with other agro-allied providers and manufacturing industries around the world.
